name: 林百福
objective: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
schedule:
1	Introduction	Ch. 1
2	Introduction, Operating Characteristics	Ch. 1, 2
3	Operating Characteristics	Ch. 2
4	Engine Cycles	Ch. 3
5	Engine Cycles, Thermochemistry and Fuels	Ch. 3, 4
6	Thermochemistry and Fuels	Ch. 4
7	Air Induction	Ch. 5
8	Fuel Induction	Ch. 5
9	期中考	
10	Fluid Motion	Ch. 6
11	Combustion	Ch. 7
12	Combustion	Ch. 7
13	Emissions and Air Pollution	Ch. 9
14	Emissions and Air Pollution	Ch. 9
15	Heat Transfer in Engines	Ch. 10
16	Friction and Lubrication	Ch. 11
17	Friction and Lubrication	Ch. 11
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考：30%
期末報告：30%
隨堂考：筆試30% (5次)
點名：10%
materials:
Engineering Fundamental of the Internal Combustin Engines, 2nd Edition
